# Privacy Policy

  

Last updated: December 11, 2023

  

This Privacy Policy ("Policy") explains how information about you is
collected, used, and disclosed by Solo Tandem Bicycle, Inc. when you use the
"Prompt Perfect" application ("the App").

Information We Collect

We may collect information about you directly from you and from third parties,
as well as automatically through your use of our App.

How We Use Your Information

We use the information we collect for various purposes, such as to provide,
maintain, and improve our App, to analyze how users interact with our App, and
to communicate with you.
sharing:
Sharing of Information

We may share your information with third parties under certain circumstances,
such as to comply with legal obligations, to protect and defend our rights and
property, or with your consent.
